## DatabaseConnection.script() method

Execute script Executes a script.

**Signature:**

```typescript
script(steps: Step[], attributes?: {
        name: string;
        value: object;
    }[]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  steps | [Step](./forms42core.sqlstep.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The steps of the script. |
|  attributes | { name: string; value: object; }\[\] | _(Optional)_ Additional attributes for the script. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;

A promise that resolves to the result of the script.
